column17:

The aesthetic combination of colours renders it a stylish look. As for the quality its soft footbed and sturdy outsole collectively offers you comfort and protection at one place. Features
  • Material: Faux leather
  • Colour: Red
  • Style: Slip-ons
  • Pattern: Open toe Toe hold
  • Detailing: Studs
Style it up with a wide range of casual outfits for a complete look. Care TipsUse a gentle cleaner on faux leather shoes and then apply a protective gel or conditioner to protect it from the elements.
